content: “There’s plenty of patient capital sloshing around the US that would be attracted to the steady, reliable returns this kind of investment will return.”If this statement is accurate, then wouldn’t that money be investing in the network you are advocating? You are right, high barriers to entry are limiting the competition necessary for high quality and low prices. But it is incredibly naive and misguided to believe that a government “solution” is desirable, let alone impossible. Eliminate the barriers to entry and let the market do its thing.
